author: bridge-bot
content:
<etan_status> > <etan_status>  there are different strategies.

- use smth like nimbus_light_client and connect it to your light EL using regular engine API

- use smth like libnimbus_lc and then feed it with light clientdata from a hosted REST API (Lodestar / Nimbus server only). example: https://eth-light.xyz (desktop only, no mobile)

- connect directly to libp2p and pull the light client data from there. like rest, there are both req/resp pull and gossipsub event push mechanisms. can also use libnimbus_lc to process it: https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/blob/stable/beacon_chain/libnimbus_lc/libnimbus_lc.h

of course, all the protocols are open specifications and can be manually implemented.

- https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/specs/altair/light-client/sync-protocol.md
- https://ethereum.github.io/beacon-APIs/#/Beacon/getLightClientUpdatesByRange
- https://ethereum.github.io/beacon-APIs/#/Events/eventstream (re @Lightclient_bot: <erayack> How can I track developments on CL light client? https://x.com/vdwijden/status/1727704235318419838?s=46&t=HeLdxx2ALGlL0lpHyPvUFQ)
